name: Mahjong Solitaire Legacy
description:
Mahjong Solitaire Legacy is a rebuild from scratch version of the original 2003 Mahjong Solitaire game popular on Mac OS X. Keeping it fun and simple, this game will give you hours of puzzle fun for only a dollar!

Features

* 7 Tilesets
* 35 Layouts
* 3 Game Modes
* 31 Backgrounds
* Undo, Shuffle and Restart
* High scores
* Music, with a built-in​ player
* 5 Difficulty Levels
* Random Layout Generator
* Statistics System
* Auto resume game
* Lots of ways to cheat!
* Rebuilt from scratch in Metal and Swift
